{player1}, sing everything you say for the next 2 rounds
Phone roulette! {player1} scrolls to a random photo, shows it, and explains the context
Russian roulette! Roll a dice. 1 = take a big penalty. 2-6 = safe!
Everyone switches penalties! Person to your right's penalty is now yours
Chaos vote! Everyone secretly points at someone. Most votes = take a big penalty
Silent round! No one can talk until the next prompt. First to speak takes a big penalty
{player1}, you're the dealer. Give out 10 forfeits however you want
Reverse! The game now goes in the opposite direction
{player1}, pick someone. You're both immune from penalties for 2 rounds
Wildcard! {player1} makes up any rule for the rest of the game
Floor is lava! Last person to get their feet off the ground forfeits 5 times
Telephone! {player1} whispers a secret to {player2}. Goes around. Compare start and end!
Power shift! {player1}, swap chaos levels with {player2}. Their penalties become yours!
{player1}, close your eyes and point. Whoever you point at chooses: truth or dare!
Alliance! {player1} picks a partner. You share all forfeits for the next 3 rounds
Random! Everyone rolls a dice (or picks 1-6). Highest number gives out forfeits = everyone else's total
Medusa! Everyone looks down. On 3, look up. If you make eye contact with someone, both forfeit!
Truth booth! {player1} answers any question from each player honestly or takes a big penalty
{player1}, Viking mode! Point at someone and say 'VIKING!' They must make rowing motions while neighbors make rowing sounds. Slowest forfeits!
Dictator! {player1} is in charge for 2 rounds. Their word is law!
Confession roulette! Everyone writes a secret. {player1} picks one and reads it. Author takes 3 forfeits

Speed round! {player1} has 30 seconds to name 10 countries. Miss = forfeit for each missed

{player1}, you have 10 seconds to make {player2} laugh. Fail = forfeit 3 times

Mini-game: FLIP CUP! Losers take 6 penalties each

sexy.text: {player1}, demonstrate your best pickup line on {player2}. Group rates it 1-10!
{player1}, who here has the best smile?
{player1}, give {player2} a 30-second shoulder massage or forfeit 3 times
Everyone who's kissed someone in this room forfeits!
{player1}, what's your biggest turn-on?
{player1}, rank everyone here by attractiveness or take a big penalty
{player1} and {player2}, staring contest. First to look away has to compliment the other's appearance
{player1}, what's the most romantic thing you've ever done?
Kiss, marry, kill with people in this room. {player1} answers!
{player1}, show your dating app profile to the group
Everyone who's sent a risky text in the last week forfeits!
{player1}, what's your type in 5 words?
{player1}, do a seductive walk across the room
{player1}, give someone here a flirty compliment
{player1}, what's your worst date story?
Truth or forfeit! {player1}, what's your body count?
{player1}, whisper something to {player2}. They decide if you forfeit based on what you said
{player1}, who was your celebrity crush growing up?
Seven minutes in heaven, but just a compliment battle. {player1} and {player2} take turns complimenting each other!
{player1}, read aloud your last flirty text
Smash or pass: {player1} picks 3 celebrities. Everyone answers!
{player1}, describe your ideal first date in detail
{player1}, serenade {player2} with any love song
{player1}, what's the most embarrassing thing in your 'For You' page?
{player1}, who here would you swipe right on?
Most likely to! Who's most likely to slide into a celebrity's DMs? Most votes forfeits!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to get married first? Most votes forfeits!
Most likely to! Who's most likely to have a secret admirer? Most votes forfeits!
{player1}, what's a deal-breaker that you know is unreasonable?
{player1}, describe {player2} as a dating profile
Take 4 penalties if you've ever unmatched someone for bad texting game
{player1}, what's your hottest take about relationships? Group votes if it's valid or you take 5
{player1}, lock eyes with {player2} for 30 seconds without laughing. First to break takes 5 penalties
If you've ever gone back to an ex, take 4 penalties
{player1}, what feature do you notice first on someone? Take a penalty for every person who guessed wrong
Take 3 penalties if you've ever pretended not to see someone you matched with IRL
{player1}, rate your own rizz from 1-10. Group votes. Difference = penalties
If you've ever sent a 'u up?' text, take 5 penalties
{player1}, describe your ideal type in emojis only. {player2} translates. Wrong = both forfeit 3
Take 3 penalties if you've ever stalked someone before a first date
{player1}, what's the smoothest thing anyone's ever said to you? Recreate it on {player2}
Hot seat! Everyone asks {player1} one spicy question. Skip any = 3 penalties each
Take 4 penalties if you have a 'type' but never admit it
{player1}, rank everyone's flirting skills. Lowest ranked takes 4 penalties
If you've ever said 'I'm just not looking for anything serious right now' while lying, take 5 penalties
{player1}, give {player2} a compliment you'd give on a first date
Take 3 penalties if you've ever had a crush on a friend's sibling
{player1}, who here would you wingman for? That person gives out 3 penalties
If you've ever been someone's 2am thought, take 3 penalties with confidence
{player1} and {player2}, trade phone backgrounds for the next 3 rounds or both forfeit 5
Take 4 penalties if you know your attachment style and have mentioned it on a date
{player1}, what's your red flag that you're fully aware of? Take a penalty for every 'same'
If you've ever liked someone's photo from 47 weeks ago, take 5 penalties (and finish if they noticed)
{player1}, send a fire emoji to the 7th person in your DMs or take 5 penalties
Most likely to! Who's most likely to double text? Point! Most votes takes 4 penalties
Take 3 penalties if you've ever practiced a text before sending it
{player1}, give a toast to situationships. Everyone forfeits at the end
If you've manifested a relationship, take 4 penalties
{player1}, describe your last 3 crushes using only movie characters. Group guesses
Take 3 penalties if you're currently texting someone you shouldn't be
{player1}, who in this room gives the best advice? Worst advice? Best gives 3, worst takes 3
If you've ever had a 'what are we' conversation, take 4 penalties
{player1}, whisper something to {player2}. They rate it 1-10. Under 5 = you forfeit that many
Most likely to! Who's most likely to get married first? Most votes takes 3 penalties
Take 5 penalties if you've ever cried over someone who didn't deserve it
{player1}, what's the biggest ick you've ever ignored? Take a penalty for every cringe
If you've ever lied about where you met someone, take 3 penalties
{player1}, you have 20 seconds to rizz up {player2}. Group scores. Under 5 = forfeit the difference
